articles.title: Panera to close bakery facility in Franklin, lay off nearly 100 workers
articles.description:

articles.title: 16-year-old New Zealander ran a 3:48 mile at BU’s Terrier Classic, set a junior world record
articles.description:

articles.title: Massachusetts keeps losing residents to other states, Census finds
articles.description:

articles.title: Active-duty Boston police officer dies after more than 30 years with department, BPD says
